content: chain 6 repeat step 4 repeat step 1 to 7 6 more times repeat step 1 to 4 once more repeat step 1 once more make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of first ring 10 ds reverse slip_stitch in 6th chain st chain 5 slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off wash and lightly starch doily pin in shape
